name: Michael Kirby
content: Untitled Michael Kirby, Professor Department of Mathematics, Department of Computer Science Director, Data Science Research Institute (DSRI) Colorado State University Biosketch Publications Funding Pattern Analysis Laboratory (PAL) Contact Information: Office: Weber 211, Colorado State University Phone: 970-491-6850, FAX: 970-491-2161 Email: Kirby  (at)  math (dot) colostate (dot) edu Research Interests:  Computational and Applied Mathematics.  Geometric data analysis, mathematical modeling and analysis of large data sets, optimization. Linear Algebra for Data Science Graduate Students: Linear Algebra for Data Science Overview Linear Algebra for Data Science I M569A On-line only Fall 2023. Linear Algebra for Data Science II M569B Fall 2023 Aug. 21-Sep. 24. Linear Algebra for Data Science III M569C Fall 2023 Sep. 26-Oct. 30. Linear Algebra for Data Science IV M569D Fall 2023 Oct. 31-Dec. 11. Undergraduate Students: DSCI 369 (4 credits) Linear Algebra for Data Science (4 credits)
